body:
Comment 2: 
This is often a feature.  I am not convinced that godoc
should try to be smarter here.
What if it says B = a + b?  Does godoc need to
keep substituting?  What if B is a var instead of a const? 
And so on.

This is actually used to good effect in the documentation
for package unicode (godoc unicode Arabic), because
otherwise you'd see very long definitions.
